name: js-go
description: Augmented Reality monster hunt & catch game based in the physical environment around you

scripts.watch: npm run build:prepare && watchify --debug --verbose -g [envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t babelify src/js/index.js -o lib/js/index.js & npm run start
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:prepare && browserify --debug --noParse=three -t babelify -t [envify --NODE_ENV development ] --full-paths src/js/index.js | tee lib/js/index.js | discify -o debug/build_dev.html && opener debug/build_dev.html
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:prepare && browserify --noparse=`node -p 'require.resolve("three")'` -g [envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify --full-paths src/js/index.js | uglifyjs - --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 | tee lib/js/index.min.js | discify -o debug/build_prod.html && opener debug/build_prod.html
scripts.build:rollup: npm run build:prepare && NODE_ENV=production rollup -c && uglifyjs lib/js/index.js --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 > lib/js/index.min.js && opener debug/build_rollup.html
scripts.build:prepare: mkdir -p lib/js && mkdir -p debug/ && cp src/server.js lib/ && cp src/key.pem lib/ && cp src/cert.pem lib/ && cp -r src/css lib/ && node ./scripts/build.js

comment1: Change to ["es2015", {"modules": false}] for rollup support
